Go to a public place and educate a person about stammering by telling him not to stop anyone who stammers from speaking. People who stammer should be heard and not bullied.
In this task you have to go out of your home or workplace and talk with a stranger. You can ask him any question or just get in a small discussion.
For completing this task you have to meditate for minimum 30 mins.
